assistant-welcome: Welcome to the query chat assistant.
assistant-function3: - Links to company detail pages, including funding records, AI-based analysis reports, and more
assistant-ask: You can ask me questions like:
assistant-ask1: - Please recommend a few agricultural companies
assistant-ask2: - What are some companies that are similar to Taboola?
assistant-ask3: - Which companies utilize laser technology for the treatment of eye diseases?
assistant-ask4: - You may also enter the name of a specific company directly, for example: Taboola.
link-to-search: You can click here to return to the traditional inquiry page, where you can search for companies by using keywords and industry filters.
ai-greeting: I am your intelligent assistant, here to help you explore infomation related to Israeli technology companies.
ai-question2: Which companies utilize laser technology for the treatment of eye diseases?
